description: The asparagus fern (Asparagus setaceus) is an amazing plant for any garden. Boasting attractive, wispy foliage, this delicate fern looks beautiful in the garden or in containers. Not only does it look great, itâ€™s also easy to care for. It prefers bright, indirect light and can even survive low light conditions. Asparagus ferns are also easy to propagate, making them a great addition to any flower bed. With its hardy nature and attractive foliage, this is an ideal choice for both experienced and beginner gardeners.
